item.title: Brown Town
item.author: jarret.lavallee@gmail.com (jarret)
item.description: I brewed this one up a few weeks back. I finally kegged it after a month in the fermenter. It is still carbonating, but I tasted it today and it is very nice. It has a nice nut flavor as you would expect with a Nut Brown. I will brew this again. UPDATE: I tasted this again today and it is delicious. It is not as full bodied as I hoped, but I like it better than other Nut Browns that I have tasted.
